entries.journal_entry_description: On your way to Mos Eisley
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: In Star Wars Galaxies, NPCs that are involved in quests are indicated by a letter I floating over their heads. Right click on them to bring up the radial menu. From there, choose the Converse option and talk with them about their quest.  These quest-giving NPCs can be found in cities and towns as well as out in the wilds.  Once you have taken a quest and killed an enemy, you will want to loot the corpse. To do this, right click on the corpse to bring up the radial menu. From that menu select the Loot option to bring up the list of what the enemy has in its inventory or the Loot All option to simply take everything the enemy has.
entries.task01_message_box_text: In Star Wars Galaxies, NPCs that are involved in quests are indicated by a letter I floating over their heads. Right click on them to bring up the radial menu. From there, choose the Converse option and talk with them about their quest.  These quest-giving NPCs can be found in cities and towns as well as out in the wilds.  Once you have taken a quest and killed an enemy, you will want to loot the corpse. To do this, right click on the corpse to bring up the radial menu. From that menu select the Loot option to bring up the list of what the enemy has in its inventory or the Loot All option to simply take everything the enemy has.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Kill the pirate down in the next room
